Description:
Detects the addition of a new Federated Domain.

Author: Splunk Threat Research Team (original rule), Harjot Singh @cyb3rjy0t (sigma rule)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Federated Domain Added
Query: sourcetype='m365-audit' eql select * from _source_ where (operation like '%domain%' and (operation like '%add%' or operation like '%new%'))
